short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to decode the language of your role, organization or industry.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Welcomary users, this is an even easier way to look up whatever unfamiliar knowledge you might come across in your work day. Just log in and type in the acronym, term or process you heard.

If your organization isn't using Welcomary yet, reach out to us at https://www.welcomary.com/contact !
